allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add QA test checklist for Social Proof Widget

Comprehensive manual testing checklist covering code quality, functionality,
admin UI, API endpoints, mobile, performance, and theme compatibility.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Configure Vercel deployment URLs

Update shopify.app.toml with production Vercel URLs:
- application_url: https://socailproofpopups.vercel.app
- redirect_urls: https://socailproofpopups.vercel.app/auth/callback
- app_proxy.url: https://socailproofpopups.vercel.app

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
